TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

summary.span: 表示 控件的样式和一些 Web 部件。

span.span: Represents the style for the control and some Web Parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示表控件的样式。The class is used to represent the style for a table control. 它封装控制表的外观并可以应用于多个表控件以提供统一的外观的属性。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a table and can be applied to multiple table controls to provide a common appearance. 可以指定要通过设置表的背景中显示的图像属性。You can specify an image to display in the background of the table by setting the property. 由控制的表的单元格之间的间距量属性。The amount of spacing between the cells of a table is controlled by the property. 使用指定的单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距属性。The spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border is specified using the property. 您可以指定是否通过设置显示单元格的边框属性。You can specify whether cell borders are displayed by setting the property. 相对于 Web 窗体页上的其他元素的表的水平对齐方式由属性。The horizontal alignment of the table in relation to other elements on the Web Forms page is indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类主要由控件开发人员使用。This class is primarily used by control developers. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后使用方法以将其应用于一个已生成对象。The following example creates a object and then uses the method to apply it to a generated object.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 将有关背景图像、单元格间距、单元格填充、网格线和对齐方式的信息添加到要呈现的特性列表中。

span.span: Adds information about the background image, cell spacing, cell padding, gridlines, and alignment to the list of attributes to render.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.

value.span: 要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the background of the table control. > [!NOTE] > 将平铺图像，如果它小于表。The image will be tiled if it is smaller than the table. 同样，如果值大于表裁剪图像。Similarly, the image is cropped if it is larger than the table. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 背景图像的 URL 被设置为 。

span.span: The URL of the background image was set to .

.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格内容与单元格边框之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的单元格内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 数据列表控件的同一列中的所有单元格具有相同的单元格宽度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果一个单元格内容的长度超过其他单元格内容的同一列中，填充量应用到最宽的单元格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 此外使用此单元格宽度设置列中的所有其他单元格。All other cells in the column are also set with this cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 填充量应用于的行中最高的单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 在同一行中的所有其他单元格设置与此单元格的高度。All other cells in the same row are set with this cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表单元格之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between table cells.

value.span: 表单元格之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between table cells.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制数据列表控件中相邻单元格之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 垂直方向和水平应用此间距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 单元格间距是一致的整个数据列表控件。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data list control. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元格间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置此属性的值大于`0`并设置属性显示单元格的边框的值，间隔显示相邻单元格边框之间。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情况下，属性控制的差异大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否显示表控件的单元格之间的边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of the table control is displayed.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of the data list control is displayed. 此属性设置其中一个枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||显示没有单元格边框。No cell border is displayed.| ||显示仅在数据列表控件中单元格的上限和下限边框。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||仅左侧和右侧显示的边框的数据列表控件中的单元格。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||显示数据列表控件中单元格所有边框。All borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign

member this.HorizontalAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表在其容器内的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the table within its container.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定其容器内的数据列表控件的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data list control within its container. 此属性设置其中一个枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||表是在其容器内左对齐。The table is left justified within its container.| ||表在其容器内居中。The table is centered within its container.| ||表是在其容器内右对齐。The table is right justified within its container.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的水平对齐方式不是 枚举值中的一个。

span.span: The specified horizontal alignment is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 清除样式的任何定义的样式元素。

span.span: Clears any defined style elements of the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除任何定义的样式元素，并使处于默认状态的样式。Clears any defined style elements, and leaves the style in the default state.
